title: Druid Spells
content: end of its next turn. Greater Restoration Lv 5 Abjuration ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Touch a creature and negate any Charm, petrified, Stun or curse afflicting it.Melee Planar Binding Lv 5 Abjuration ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Target an otherworldly creature and attach its consciousness to your own. It will follow and fight for you as an ally.10 TurnsTarget must be a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend. 18m WIS SaveConcentration Conjure Elemental Lv 5 Conjuration ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Ben
